description: Tourists from 29 countries will be able to visit Greece from 15 June, but not travellers from the UK.
title: Coronavirus: Greece to open up in two weeks, but not to the UK
title_page: Coronavirus: Greece to open up in two weeks, but not to the UK - BBC News
maintext: "Our aim is to be able to welcome every tourist who has overcome their fear and has the ability to travel to our country," Tourism Minister Harry Theoharis said on Antenna television.
